name: Puzzle Rocks
description:
Take your time to find the best strategy, improve your moves, and make as many matches as possible during a single turn to improve your score.

Question one: How to keep your brain active?

Answer: Play Puzzle Rocks! Stop the falling stones!

Question two: Do you have what it takes to get through 36 various levels? Answer: We will see.

Features:

- 36 different levels in 4 chapters, combining 6 different shapes with 6 colors in a brain-teaser - Match-3 style puzzle game on second screen - Switch match-3 and shape-match minigame anytime - Normal and time limit mode - Combos with explosive lighting and sound effects - Many hours of entertainment - Record of best scores for each level - Collect bronze, silver, and gold medals for each level
